column1: PS C:\Users\student\OneDrive - Atlantic TU\Desktop\Test> & C:/Users/student/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python311/python.exe "c:/Users/student/OneDrive - Atlantic TU/Desktop/Test/udp_server.py"
